items.sentence: I may have to come home late. In that case, I'll call you.
It's been three years since my younger sister got married.
The address you're looking for is very near the city hall.
I don't think that any of the people over there are women.
Tom didn't have time to finish what he was supposed to do.
I don't think the dryer was responsible for the shrinkage.
The captain was the last person to leave the sinking ship.
I don't think any of you realize the significance of this.
I forgive you because you didn't know what you were doing.
Tom seems to believe that he's the centre of the universe.
